item.title: UltraGreen.ai 首次公开募股 4 亿美元后将在新加坡上市交易
item.description: UltraGreen.ai将于周三上午开始交易，这是新加坡自2017年以来除房地产投资信托外最大的首次公开募股。【原文：UltraGreen.ai is set to begin trading Wednesday morning in Singapore’s biggest initial public offering since 2017 excluding real estate investment trusts.】

item.title: 汇丰资产称中国债券收益率可能回落至历史最高水平
item.description: 汇丰银行资产管理公司（HSBC Asset Management）称，由于经济复苏不平衡，中国央行面临降息压力，明年中国政府债券收益率可能回落至历史最低水平。【原文：China’s government bond yields are likely to fall back toward a record low next year as an uneven economic recovery puts pressure on the central bank to cut interest rates, according to HSBC Asset Management.】

item.title: YouTube 最终将遵守澳大利亚对 16 岁以下儿童的禁令
item.description: 澳大利亚即将对 16 岁以下青少年实施社交媒体禁令，YouTube 正在采取措施遵守这一禁令，尽管此前该公司曾拒绝将其纳入打击范围，并有猜测称该公司正在考虑向法院提出挑战。【原文：YouTube is taking steps to comply with Australia’s upcoming under-16s social media ban, even after rejecting its inclusion in the crackdown and speculation that the company was considering a court challenge.】

item.title: 加密货币反弹，亚洲股市谨慎上涨：市场综述
item.description: 在华尔街股市小幅上扬、加密货币反弹标志着风险偏好回升之后，亚洲股市周三开盘大体向好。【原文：Asian stocks were set for a mostly positive open on Wednesday following modest gains on Wall Street and a rebound in cryptocurrencies that signaled pockets of returning risk appetite.】

item.title: Medline 考虑最快于下周一进行 50 亿美元的首次公开募股 (IPO)
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Medline 公司最快将于下周一正式开始首次公开募股的市场推广工作，这有望成为今年美国最大的一次上市。【原文：Medline Inc. is set to begin formal marketing for its initial public offering as soon as Monday, according to people familiar with the matter, in what’s expected to be the biggest US listing this year.】

item.title: JD.com 供应链技术部门在香港首次公开募股中寻求高达 4.24 亿美元的投资
item.description: JD.com Inc.的供应链技术部门已开始接受香港首次公开募股的投资者订单，募集资金可能高达33亿港元（4.24亿美元），为两年多的上市努力画上了句号。【原文：JD.com Inc.’s supply-chain technology unit has started taking investor orders for a Hong Kong initial public offering that may raise as much as HK$3.3 billion ($424 million), capping more than two years of efforts to go public.】

item.title: 甲骨文信贷恐惧指数创 2009 年以来新高，原因是担心人工智能泡沫破裂
item.description: 甲骨文公司（Oracle Corp. ）债务风险指数收于金融危机以来的最高水平，此前科技巨头纷纷抛售债券，加剧了人们对人工智能行业正在形成泡沫的担忧。【原文：A risk gauge on Oracle Corp. debt closed at the highest level since the financial crisis after a flood of bond sales from tech giants amplified concerns that a bubble is forming in the artificial-intelligence industry.】

item.title: 科技行业阻止各州人工智能法的努力在国会碰壁
item.description: 美国国会一位重要的共和党人周二表示，白宫人工智能主管支持的一个强大的科技公司联盟似乎未能说服立法者利用一项必须通过的国防法案来阻止州政府对人工智能进行监管。【原文：A powerful coalition of tech companies backed by the White House’s artificial intelligence chief appears to have failed to persuade lawmakers to use a must-pass defense bill to block state governments from regulating artificial intelligence, a key congressional Republican signaled Tuesday.】

item.title: 中国顶级经济学家称现在是允许人民币走强的时候了
item.description: 中国最大的投资银行之一的一位经济学家说，现在是政府允许人民币进一步升值的时候了，这一决定将为消费者提供更大的消费能力，并为贸易紧张局势降温。【原文：An economist at one of China’s biggest investment banks said the time has come for authorities to allow for more appreciation in the yuan, a decision that would give consumers greater spending power and cool trade tensions.】

item.title: S&P 将 AI-Power Darling Vistra 的评级提升至投资级
item.description: 威仕达公司（Vistra Corp. —）是人工智能热潮中美国电力行业最大的受益者之一，S&P.将其评级提升至投资级。【原文：Vistra Corp. — one of the biggest US power-sector beneficiaries of the AI boom — was upgraded to investment grade by S&P.】

item.title: 安全公司 UL Solutions 所有者发售 1250 万股股票
item.description: 在 UL Solutions 公司首次公开募股一年半之后，该公司的非营利所有者将发售 1250 万股股票。【原文：The nonprofit owner of UL Solutions Inc. is offering 12.5 million shares for sale, a year and a half after the safety testing firm’s initial public offering.】

item.title: CrowdStrike 以 "发展势头 "为由上调财年业绩预期
item.description: CrowdStrike Holdings Inc.上调了 2026 财年的业绩预期，表明市场对该公司不断扩大的人工智能网络安全产品组合的需求将持续增长。【原文：CrowdStrike Holdings Inc. raised its fiscal year 2026 guidance, signaling resilient demand for the company’s expanding portfolio of artificial intelligence-enabled cybersecurity products.】

item.title: 巴蒂斯塔斯将聘请花旗出售铁矿公司股权
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，巴蒂斯塔兄弟控制的巴西控股公司J&F SA —已聘请花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.【原文：J&F SA — the Brazilian holding company controlled by the Batista brothers — has hired Citigroup Inc. to sell a minority stake in its LHG Mining unit to a potential strategic partner, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Marvell将收购Celestial AI，股价因看涨言论而大涨
item.description: Marvell Technology Inc. 宣布计划以至少 32.5 亿美元的价格收购初创公司 Celestial AI，以获取更多人工智能计算支出。【原文：Marvell Technology Inc. announced plans to acquire startup Celestial AI for at least $3.25 billion, part of a push to capture more of the runaway spending on artificial intelligence computing.】

item.title: 拉里-萨默斯终身不得加入美国经济学会
item.description: 哈佛大学前校长、美国财政部长拉里-萨默斯（Larry Summers）与性犯罪者杰弗里-爱泼斯坦（Jeffrey Epstein）的关系细节在上个月浮出水面后，美国经济学会对他处以终身禁言的处罚。【原文：Larry Summers was handed a lifetime ban by the American Economic Association after details of the former Harvard president and US Treasury Secretary’s connection to sex offender Jeffrey Epstein surfaced last month.】

item.title: 美国向 TVA 和 Holtec 公司拨款 8 亿美元以推动小型核电厂的发展
item.description: 美国向两家开发商提供了 8 亿美元的资金，用于建造小型反应堆，这是特朗普政府为加快部署该技术以满足急剧增长的电力需求所做努力的一部分。【原文：The US awarded $800 million to two developers to build small reactors, part of the Trump administration’s efforts to accelerate deployment of the technology to meet soaring power needs.】

item.title: S&P称新西兰利率上限可能对议会造成负面影响
item.description: 据S&P全球评级公司（S&P Global Ratings）称，新西兰政府计划对地方议会收取的土地税（或称差饷）设置上限，除非随着时间的推移削减支出增长，否则该计划可能会对该行业的信用产生负面影响。【原文：The New Zealand government’s plan to impose a cap on land taxes, or rates, charged by local councils could be credit negative for the sector unless matched over time with cuts in spending growth, according to S&P Global Ratings.】

item.title: 摩根大通称美国收益率将随降息预期减弱而上升
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）的策略师表示，国债不太可能在2026年复制今年的强劲表现，因为市场已经对美联储的多次降息进行了定价。【原文：Strategists at JPMorgan Chase & Co. say it’s unlikely that Treasuries will replicate this year’s strong performance in 2026 because markets have priced in too many Federal Reserve rate cuts.】

item.title: MDA Space 计划首次出售 1.79 亿美元高收益债券
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，加拿大空间技术公司 MDA Space Ltd. 正准备于本周晚些时候在高收益债券市场上融资约 2.5 亿加元（约合 1.79 亿美元）。【原文：Canadian space-technology company MDA Space Ltd. is preparing to raise around C$250 million ($179 million) in the high-yield bond market later this week, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 监督机构警告：卡尼将住宅建设翻番的承诺存疑
item.description: 加拿大预算监督机构估计，政府新成立的住房机构在五年内只能建造 2.6 万套住房，这与加拿大在未来十年内将住房建设翻一番的目标相去甚远。【原文：Canada’s budget watchdog estimates the government’s new housing agency will only build 26,000 homes over five years, leaving the country far from its target of doubling housing construction over the next decade.】

item.title: 据说 Notion 正在考虑以 120 亿美元估值进行要约收购
item.description: 据知情人士透露，生产力软件公司 Notion 正在讨论让部分员工和早期投资者以约 120 亿美元的估值出售股票。【原文：Notion, a productivity software company, is in discussions to let some employees and early investors sell shares at a valuation of about $12 billion, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 根斯勒表示，美国监管机构肯定会关注芝加哥商品交易所的故障问题
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会前主席加里-根斯勒（Gary Gensler）周二表示，美国监管机构将继续调查芝加哥商业交易所最近长达数小时的故障。【原文：US regulators will continue looking at the recent hours-long outage of the Chicago Mercantile Exchange, former Securities and Exchange Commission Chair Gary Gensler said Tuesday.】

item.title: 午餐碗可能不是林黛玉的
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. item.title: 股价上涨后，卡塔尔将出售 3.6 亿美元的森斯伯瑞公司股份
item.description: 卡塔尔主权财富基金计划出售价值约 2.73 亿英镑（约合 3.6 亿美元）的 J Sainsbury Plc 股份，标志着该超市最大股东的一次重大减持。【原文：Qatar’s sovereign wealth fund plans to sell a stake worth about £273 million ($360 million) in J Sainsbury Plc, marking a significant selldown by the supermarket’s largest shareholder.】

item.title: 康卡斯特寻求将 NBC 环球与华纳兄弟合并
item.description: 据熟悉康卡斯特公司计划的人士透露，康卡斯特公司正寻求将其 NBCUniversal 部门与华纳兄弟发现公司合并。【原文：Comcast Corp. is looking to merge its NBCUniversal division with Warner Bros. Discovery Inc., according to people familiar with the company’s plans.】

item.title: 美国 IPO 银行家费用在关门期间仍保持强劲增长，超过去年同期水平
item.description: 美国首次公开募股、股票销售和可转换债券的承销费已经超过了去年，尽管关税忧虑和政府停摆抑制了交易机会。【原文：Fees from underwriting US IPOs, stock sales and convertible bonds have already surpassed last year’s, even as tariff angst and the government shutdown curbed dealmaking opportunities.】

item.title: 厄瓜多尔中央银行行长辞职，提前离任
item.description: 厄瓜多尔中央银行行长吉列尔莫-阿韦兰（Guillermo Avellán）周二宣布辞职，称他将在任期结束前一年多离职，以寻求其他职业机会。【原文：Ecuador central bank chief Guillermo Avellán announced his resignation Tuesday, saying he would leave the job more than a year before the end of his term to pursue other professional opportunities.】

item.title: 高盛 20 亿美元创新交易为 ETF 造就罕见的亿万富翁
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc.’s decision to buy Innovator Capital Management in a deal worth $2 billion is delivering a massive payday to the exchange-traded fund issuer’s founders.】

item.title: 交易员竞相为美联储新主席的鸽派政策转变定价
item.description: 在权衡唐纳德-特朗普支持的美联储主席人选和一系列可能重塑经济前景的延迟数据的前景时，美国期货市场的交易商们正在博弈各种政策路径。【原文：Traders in US futures markets are gaming out a wide range of policy paths as they weigh the prospect of a Donald Trump–backed Federal Reserve chair and a raft of delayed data that could reshape the economic outlook.】

item.title: 芝加哥商品交易所称美国证券交易委员会批准建立国债和回购清算所
item.description: 芝加哥商品交易所集团称，美国证券交易委员会已批准一家新的清算所注册，该清算所将促进遵守美国证券交易委员会即将出台的有关国库证券和回购交易的规定。【原文：CME Group Inc. said the US Securities and Exchange Commission has approved the registration of a new clearing house that will facilitate compliance with forthcoming SEC mandates for Treasury securities and repo transactions.】
